Class PIDController

  • java.lang.Object
    • PIDController.PIDController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class PIDController
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Wrapper class for the PID controller

    1.0
    Author:
    Nicolas Dutly
